title: (x) Caribbean Reef Club - University Roman {Karl}
content: Hoping someone can help me identify this particular font. It looks sort of like Accolade, but there are a few special differences. Any help would be much appreciated ![Carribean Reef Club Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123139im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37520.jpg)
author: hoosierquilt

comments.content: Holy, moley. That was quick, Karl, and thank you sew ;-) much! I can now digitize this logo for this company!
